text: Professor Siddheshwar Prasad (born 19 January 1929) is an Indian politician. He is a member of the Indian National Congress. He was elected to the Lok Sabha, lower house of the Parliament of India from the Nalanda Constituency of Bihar in 1962, 1967 and 1971. He was the Governor of Tripura from June 1995 to June 2000. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:Governors of Tripura Category:Living people Category:Members of the Lok Sabha
title: Siddheshwar Prasad
